attributes.action: Set up a Royal Commission to establish why so many black people fail in the UK.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
I am a second-generation black man living and contributing in the UK.
I have reach the time in my life where I am very concerned about the future of my children with regards to fair opportunities open to them.
All around me, I see and hear negative stereotypes attributed to black people -(Boys in particular)
Gun crime, Muggings, Dealing and taking of drugs. The list goes on and on.

Why do black boys fail at school?
Why are black people underr epresented in senior positions in both the public and private sector?

I accept that many faults can be addressed by the black community (is there one?) but this failure doesn't explain our lack of achievement in the UK.

reasons: Language which is offensive, intemperate, or provocative
